attributes.action: not allow MP's £23 000 allowances for their 2nd homes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
MP's may be allowed to award themselves £23k a year for their second homes. 

If all the MP's award themselves this they're taking £14,858,000 out of tax payers money to pay of their second homes.

I believe that this money could be much better spent on public services rather than several hundred sofas.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
